body_html: I don't think the "dataset has 10 batches" is a concern that we should take into account when designing a data loader. This probably means that it fits in your memory entirely, and so you don't need multiprocessing at all.
body_text: I don't think the "dataset has 10 batches" is a concern that we should take into account when designing a data loader. This probably means that it fits in your memory entirely, and so you don't need multiprocessing at all.
body: I don't think the "dataset has 10 batches" is a concern that we should take into account when designing a data loader. This probably means that it fits in your memory entirely, and so you don't need multiprocessing at all.
